title: XView 2.0.1 – Photo Image Viewer and Video Player
content: XView 2 is a full-featured video player and image browsing tool to directly view images and play video & audio files in archive without unzip. title: Sketchode 1.3.2 – Graphical representation of a design project created in Sketch
content: Sketchode is a graphical representation of a design project created in Sketch that helps you optimize mobile and desktop applications development. It has significantly improved the process of creating designs and web-based interfaces. Sketchode is a software solution that can restore in its graphical user interface any design project created with the help of Sketch, […]

title: PDF Reader++ 1.58 – PDF reader, note-taker, Splitter, merger and converter
content: PDF Reader++ is a PDF reader, note-taker, PDF Splitter, PDF merger and PDF converter for OS X. title: Bee 2.4.8 – Client for tracking in FogBugz, GitHub, and JIRA
content: Bee syncs with GitHub Issues, JIRA, and FogBugz. You can also use Bee to keep track of your plain text notes.   Features: Flight Path. Flight Path lives in your menu bar and helps you by intelligently selecting the task you should be working on next. Notifications. Bee uses Notification Center to inform you of […]

title: Riffstation 1.6.1 – Practice and learn songs on the guitar
content: Riffstation helps guitarists and musicians practice and learn songs from their music collection. title: Disk Health 1.3 – Fast disk cleaner and duplicate finder

title: Remixlive 1.3.2 – Remix loops with pads
